thread.title: High-end townhouse development planned across from Mormon meetinghouse
thread.title_full: High-end townhouse development planned across from Mormon meetinghouse

author: Jacob Adelman
title: High-end townhouse development planned across from Mormon meetinghouse
text:
High-end townhouse development planned across from Mormon meetinghouse Updated: February 21, 2017 — 4:02 PM EST 5 Share Jacob Adelman Staff Writer 

“NOVO Philly” project, as it’s being marketed, is scheduled for groundbreaking in April, with the first homes expected to be ready spring 2018, according to the release. 
’s other area projects have included the newly constructed “The 7inSpire” townhouse development at 115-117 Church St. in Old City and renovations to developer Bart Blatstein’s home beside Rittenhouse Square. our guidelines | Comments FAQ
